application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: On Dalling Road boundary:(T1) -Large Olive(Oleo europaea) - reduce crown by 25% to suitable growth points -reduce lateral side growth to match-crown lift by 1m to allow greater clearance over play area -clean crown by remove all deadwood(T2)-Norway Maple(Acer platanoides) - reduce crown by 30% to suitable growth point- reduce lateral side growth to match, shape, balance and tidy(T3)-Whitebeam(Sorbus aria) -crown by 25% to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branch length to match with emphasis on branches overhanging pavement(T4) -Whitebeam(Sorbus aria) - crown by 25% to suitable growth points- reduce lateral branch length to match with emphasis on branches overhanging pavement(T5) -Tall Silver Birch(Betula pendula) - reduce crown height by 3m to suitable union-reduce lateral branches to match, shape, balance and tidyIn NE corner near sports pitch:(T6) - Robinia(R.pseudoacacia) - reduce crown height by 30%(3m) to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branch length to match- clean crown by removing all deadwood - carry out full aerial inspection to,check for splits, cracks etc and report any defects
